headline: PepsiCo's Stock Valuation Looks Attractive: Buy or Wait for Now?

headline: Celsius Holdings (CELH) Is Up 12.1% After Pepsi Distribution Gains Spotlight Operational Shift
summary: In recent days, analyst reports have highlighted Celsius Holdings' momentum as it benefits from expanded energy drink distribution, successful brand transitions, and product innovation underpinned by its partnerships with third-party manufacturers and PepsiCo. A particularly interesting angle is how the near-complete transition of the Alani brand and wider Pepsi distribution are being framed as key drivers of improved operational efficiency and market-share gains across Celsius Holdings’...
